Publish.LongDescription:
# Mini Track Services Welcome to the future (or the past) [depending on when you're reading this].
Gone are the days where you have to construct huge rail yard and cargo stations, specially there's no place for them in a rural area. More important if you want to use "Historical Start" mod or you want to detail your own station around these.
This mod includes 4 single fixed length bi-directional tracks which functions as both passenger and cargo stations and a rail yard. All three has two upgrades each, which includes additional tracks (can be placed as much space you have and does not require road access) and a non-visual extension upgrade for each for comfort, storage and maintenance respectively.
But if you're counting that's just 3, what's the other one? The other one is a hybrid track which acts as all three at once. Trains can spawn from it, can pick up passengers and cargo (on separate trains).
You can find all the items in a the existing Trains tab in the Transportation menu.
# Asset Set Details * Total Count: 10 * Primary: 4 ** UI priority: Train > 500 - 504 * Upgrades: 6
# DISCLAIMER * Safe to remove. This mod will not break your save if removed. However the assets will no longer work. * This mod may require ***Asset Packs Manager*** which is highly experimental. This mod shouldn't break the save game. But subscribing to assets that require this without the dependency will pop up errors.
